analysis.description:
PGF500Sale.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#222-238) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#236-237)

PGF500Sale._getCurrentPeriod (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#388-389) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (periods[i].startTimestamp <= block.timestamp) && (periods[i].endTimestamp >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#37-45) should be declared external
Pausable.pause (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#79-84) should be declared external
Pausable.unpause (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#87-94) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#149-150) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#150-151) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#153-154) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#161-162) should be declared external
ERC20.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#163-166) should be declared external
ERC20.approve (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#166-169) should be declared external
PGF500Sale.addPeriod (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#244-256) should be declared external
PGF500Sale.clearPeriods (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#257-259) should be declared external
PGF500Sale.addAddressesToWhitelist (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#289-297) should be declared external
PGF500Sale.removeAddressesFromWhitelist (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#325-334) should be declared external
PGF500Sale.remainingTokens (/unique_contracts/0x781aca570d581f51a2fac341f768242ae2220bf9.sol#381-382) should be declared external
